data.name: Striving for Light Demo
data.detailed_description: Striving for Light is a rogue-lite ARPG where you utilise a unique infinite expanding skilltree to fight your way through the darkness, striving for light.
data.about_the_game: Striving for Light is a rogue-lite ARPG where you utilise a unique infinite expanding skilltree to fight your way through the darkness, striving for light.
data.short_description: Striving for Light is a rogue-lite ARPG where you utilise a unique infinite expanding skilltree to fight your way through the darkness, striving for light.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 or higher
  • Processor: 3 Ghz or higher
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX650 or equivalent
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Yes

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Processor: 3 Ghz or higher
  • Memory: 4 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX650 or equivalent
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Yes
